cards.flavor: While a planeswalker can leave in an instant, they must carefully plan when they want to stay.
cards.name: Adventuring Pack
cards.text:
As long as you control four or more differently named lands, creatures you control get +1/+1.
As long as you control a land named Far-Off Lands, creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Aki, the Fallen Child
cards.text:
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.
[-1]: Put a -1/-1 counter on target tapped creature.
[-2]: You gain 2 life for each tapped creature your opponents control.
[-3]: Destroy all creatures that attacked a planeswalker you controlled since your last turn.

cards.flavor: A childhood traded for a chance of power.
cards.name: Aki's Study
cards.text:
Archive X, where X is the number of planeswalkers you control. (As this enters, shuffle the top X cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this when the archived library is empty.)
Remove a loyalty counter from a planeswalker you control: Draw a card from the archived library.

cards.flavor: “The Architect will return. The Architect will return. The Architect will return.”
cards.name: Akinel, Citadel Steward
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
If a card would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: The most important part of life is knowing where to be the center of attention.
cards.name: All Eyes On Me
cards.text:
You may cast this spell without paying its mana cost if it targets a spell you control.
You may choose new targets for target spell.

cards.flavor:
“The empire may not act, but with results, its soldiers will waver and see the truth.”
—Sir Éloi
cards.name: Angelic Barracks
cards.text:
As Angelic Barracks enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.

cards.flavor: “Ignore the errant knight. Listen to the empire. Have patience. Have faith. Stop fighting. Have patience. Have faith.”
cards.name: Angelic Liege
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Angel spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Other Angels you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

cards.name: Ante Up!
cards.text: Flip a coin until you lose a flip or choose to stop flipping. Exile the top X cards of each player's library, where X is 1 plus the number of flips you won. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

cards.name: Arazu, the Wishing Blade

cards.flavor: A gilded cage is a cage all the same.
cards.name: Ascendant's Cell
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Ascendant's Cell: You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control twice this turn rather than only once.

cards.name: Ascending Downfall
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, put a burst counter on Ascending Downfall, then if that spell's mana value is less than the number of burst counters on Ascending Downfall, sacrifice it and it deals damage equal to the number of burst counters on it to any target.

cards.flavor: A fragment of divinity, brought down to earth.
cards.name: Aukashi, the Rising Storm
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Then copy any number of cards exiled with Aukashi, the Rising Storm with mana value X or less and cast the copies without paying their mana costs, where X is the number of cards exiled with Aukashi.
Equip {2}

cards.flavor: ‘Overprepared' is quitter talk.
cards.name: Bag of Holding
cards.text:
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

cards.name: Big Rock
cards.text:
When Big Rock enters, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Big Rock: It deals 2 damage to any target. Activate this ability only if you control a Giant.

cards.flavor:
“We're done waiting for saviors. We'll take matters into our own wings.”
—Sir Éloi
cards.name: Blade of Reckoning
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Blade of Reckoning deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices an untapped permanent.

cards.flavor: No matter the method, all evidence of the frustrated planeswalker's existence vanished within moments.
cards.name: Blank Pages
cards.text: If a player would mill one or more cards, they mill that many cards plus two instead.

cards.name: Brajjebaw, the Gambler
cards.text:
[+2]: Discard a card at random. If you do, draw two cards.
[0]: Target creature's controller may pay X life. If they don't, you lose X life and gain control of it (Choose any number for X.)
[-3]: Flip a coin until you lose a flip or choose to stop flipping. For each flip you won, draw two cards and create a tapped Treasure token.

cards.flavor: “Care to try your luck?”
cards.name: Brajjebaw's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever a player discards a card, draw a card from the archived library.

cards.flavor: One body. Five souls. And every single one of them wants out.
cards.name: Break Free
cards.text: You may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. If it's a planeswalker, it enters with five loyalty counters rather than any other amount, and you may activate its loyalty abilities this turn any time you could cast an instant.

cards.name: Bvala, Queen of the Swarm
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a green enchantment token named Swarm with “At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.”
[-2]: Create a green enchantment token named Survive with “Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain life equal to its power.”
[-4]: Create a green enchantment token named Scrounge with “Whenever a creature you control enters, draw a card.”

cards.flavor: It seemed no world would accept her hive.
cards.name: Bvala's Study
cards.text:
Archive X (As this enters, shuffle the top X cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

cards.name: Cd-hr, Raid Leader
cards.text:
[+1]: Untap up to one target creature. It gains deathtouch until your next turn.
[-2]: Target player sacrifices a creature. Return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-5]: Put any number of permanent cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield, then sacrifice that many permanents.

cards.name: Cd-hr's Study
cards.text:
Archive 4 (As this enters, shuffle the top four cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: Put a permanent card with a mana value less than the sacrificed permanent's from the archived library onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: “Seal the gates. No one gets in. Nothing gets out.”
cards.name: Citadel Gates
cards.text:
As Citadel Gates enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

cards.flavor: A masterpiece of a foregone era.
cards.name: Citadel Portal
cards.text: {X}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If its mana value is X or less, you may play it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your hand. X can't be 0.

cards.flavor: As a child, they had never given her a second thought. As an ascendant, she never gave them a second to think.
cards.name: Clear Your Mind
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent.

cards.flavor: “Hursar tell secret, belt gives no strength at all. Very good at hiding belly though!”
cards.name: Colossus Belt
Compromised Vault
cards.text:
If a player would draw one or more cards except for the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, they exile a card from their hand before they draw those cards.
{1}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may play target card exiled with Compromised Vault, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any color to cast that spell.

cards.flavor:
“How I wish I could return there, instead of doling out these wishes to the ungrateful.”
—Qaraz
cards.name: Coveted Tower
cards.text:
As Coveted Tower enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.

cards.name: Damian, the Boss
cards.text:
As Damian, the Boss enters, pay up to 5 life. He enters with that many additional loyalty counters.
[-X]: You gain X plus 3 life.
[-1]: You draw a card and each opponent discards a card.
[-4]: Destroy up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 green Mole creature token.

cards.flavor: “Broken legs heal. Broken kneecaps change your victim's whole life.”
cards.name: Damian's Silencer
cards.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes blocked, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

cards.flavor: “You. My place. We need to talk.”
cards.name: Damian's Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, target opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.

cards.name: Damian's Undercity
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{G}: Until end of turn, Damian's Undercity becomes a 2/2 creature. It's still a land. It has lifelink if {W} was spent to activate this ability, gets +0/+3 if {U} was spent, and has deathtouch if {B} was spent.

cards.flavor:
“They're just so cute when they think they're about to get away.”
—Jozel, mistress of trickery
cards.name: Dance, My Puppet
cards.text: The controller of target creature sacrifices it. You may return it to the battlefield under your control. If you do, sacrifice it.

cards.flavor: A two-story robot won't solve all your problems, but it certainly solves a lot.
cards.name: Defect's Precinct
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{R}: Until end of turn, Defect's Precinct becomes a 3/3 creature. It's still a land. It has trample if {G} was spent to activate this ability, has vigilance if {W} was spent, and has hexproof if {U} was spent.

cards.name: Defect's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a permanent card from the archived library, you may have Defect's Study become a copy of it until end of turn.

cards.name: Defect 37
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, Defect 37 is a 7/7 Vehicle artifact with crew 2.
[+1]: Creatures and Vehicles you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[-1]: Put target permanent into its owner's library, third from the top. If Defect 37 is on the battlefield, return her to her owner's hand.
[-6]: Until end of turn, each noncreature, nonland permanent you control becomes a creature in addition to its other types with base power and toughness each equal to their mana value or base power, whichever is greater.

cards.flavor:
“Arrgh! Again! Quadruple or nothing! I can't keep losing forever!”
—Brajjebaw of Los Rejos
cards.name: Den of Vice
cards.text:
As Den of Vice enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

cards.flavor: The cries of the birds finally ceased as night fell. The survivors came together, certain their terror was over. But as the sun rose once more, so too did the flock.
cards.name: Destroyed Hopes
cards.text: For each creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: All that remains are corpses, ruins, and thousands and thousands of feathers.
cards.name: Destroyed Isle
cards.text:
As Destroyed Isle enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

cards.flavor: The Flock's destruction inspires fear in even the bravest of fools.
cards.name: Destroyed Monument
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Destroyed Study
cards.text:
Archive 4 (As this enters, shuffle the top four cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player may pay 2 life. If they do, you gain 2 life. Otherwise, you draw a card from the archived library.

cards.flavor: “Name your wish, and I'll try to grant it. Emphasis on ‘try.'”
cards.name: Djinn's Trick
cards.text:
Choose a card name, then reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a card with the chosen name into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Flynn wasn't sure if it was the dragon helmet or the dress that was making her feel braver.
cards.name: Draconic Dress
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is a Dragon in addition to its other types.
Equip {1}

cards.flavor: “If they won't remember me, I'll find a way to make them remember.”
cards.name: Drops of Yesterday
cards.text: Target player draws a card for each card in their graveyard.

cards.flavor: You're just never fully dressed without a blade in each hand.
cards.name: Dueling Blades

cards.flavor: Each aetherborn that carries the spark adds new planes to the whirring model.
cards.name: Eternal Orrery
cards.text: Once each turn, you may activate an additional loyalty ability of a planeswalker you control any time you could cast an instant.

cards.flavor: “Can you even call it science if no one is screaming at you that you're a monster?”
cards.name: Examination Table
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: You lose life equal to the sacrificed creature's power and draw cards equal to its toughness.

cards.flavor:
“We don't have anything like this back home!”
—Mabil Fardancer
cards.name: Exotic Vista
cards.text:
Exotic Vista enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
When Exotic Vista enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.name: Experiment Zero
cards.text:
Flash
You may activate Zero's loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant on your turn and the turn they entered.
[+2]: Destroy up to one target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.
[-2]: You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
[-3]: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Experimental Upgrades
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Choose a permanent you control. Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may merge one of those cards that shares a card type with the chosen permanent under it. It has those card's abilities. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor:
“Every plane's mana has its own unique tune. Find the harmony, and your spells will sing all the better.”
—Mabil Fardancer
cards.name: Fardancer Liege
cards.text: Fardancer Liege's power and toughness are each equal to the number of colors of mana that lands you control could produce.

cards.name: Ferried Stagecoach
cards.text:
Ferried Stagecoach can't be blocked as long as another creature is attacking.
Whenever Ferried Stagecoach deals combat damage to a player, each player flips a coin. Each opponent that loses the flip discards a card, and each player on your team that wins the flip draws a card.

cards.flavor: Undue's summons constantly rot, a reminder of his divine cost to pay.
cards.name: Festering Undead
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card.
{1}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Flynn, the Dragoneer
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 blue Dragon creature token with flying and “This creature can't attack unless you control a nontoken Dragon.”
[-2]: Flynn deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the total power of Dragons you control.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Dragon spells you cast cost {U}{R} less to cast and have flash.”

cards.flavor: “Go get em, Ilieth!”
cards.name: Flynn's Study
cards.text:
Archive 6 (As this enters, shuffle the top six cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, you may cast the top card of the archived library without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor:
“Ooooooooooh!”
—Flynn
cards.name: Flynn's Wonder
cards.text:
Create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste.
Whenever a nontoken Dragon you control attacks, you may return Flynn's Wonder from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“What was that, dear? I couldn't hear you over all those fireballs!”
— Llereaux Chiaro
cards.name: Forebearer's Brooch
cards.text: If a spell, ability, or creature an opponent controls would deal 4 or more damage to you or cause you to lose 4 or more life, you lose 4 life instead. (Damage won't be dealt.)

cards.name: Forgotten Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, each opponent mills two cards.

cards.flavor:
“Sorry, me. You'll thank me earlier.”
—Llereaux Chiaro
cards.name: Futuretheft
cards.text:
Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, sacrifice each land you control. Whenever you cast a spell during that turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Exile Futuretheft.

cards.name: Gambling Table
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you win the game if the total mana value of permanents you control is exactly 21. If it's more than 21, sacrifice Gambling Table and all Card tokens you control. Otherwise, create a colorless Card artifact token with mana cost {2} and “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”

cards.name: Giant's Temple
cards.text:
Giant's Temple enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{2}{G}, {T}: Target nonland permanent you control becomes a creature with power and toughness equal to its mana value until end of turn. (It loses all other types.)

cards.flavor: The child showed tremendous power, quickly bringing those eager to exploit it.
cards.name: Give New Life
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Reveal the top card of each of your libraries. Put each permanent card revealed this way with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed permanent's onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: “There is no need for war. Join the Empire, and all transgressions against it will be forgiven.”
cards.name: Glorious Plate
Grohl
cards.text:
[+2]: Destroy up to one target noncreature permanent.
[0]: Grohl becomes a legendary green 6/6 Elk Giant creature with trample, hexproof, and haste until your next turn.
[-9]: For each permanent you control, create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.name: Grohl's Study
cards.text:
Archive 6
Grohl's Study's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the archived library.
Whenever Grohl's Study deals combat damage to a player, you may put a card from the archived library into your hand.

cards.flavor: With every step, the halls twist and turn, until you're lost, trapped, and hers forever.
cards.name: Haunted Hovel
cards.text:
Haunted Hovel enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
When Haunted Hovel enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor: “How could you?”
cards.name: Heart's Reversal
cards.text: Gain control of target attacking creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Hemomancy
cards.text:
Whenever you lose 2 or more life during your turn, put two blood counters on Hemomancy.
{1}{B}, Remove X blood counters from Hemomancy: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
“I'm over here! Come and get me!”
—Jozel, mistress of trickery
cards.name: Here Forever
cards.text:
When Here Forever enters, exile target creature or planeswalker until Here Forever leaves the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, the owner of the exiled card loses 1 life.

cards.flavor:
“Welcome to the resistance, population, you, me, and a handful of fighters who've had enough.”
—Winona, to Xenocrata
cards.name: Heretic's Home
cards.text:
Heretic's Home enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
When Heretic's Home enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor:
“Lorwyn's nice and all but... it just gets a little boring, y'know? It's nice to get away too.”
—Pidge
cards.name: Humble Bridge
cards.text:
Humble Bridge enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
When Humble Bridge enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor: “No worries! Hursar will take this one with one paw tied behind back!”
cards.name: Hursar's Intervention
cards.text: Target creature you control becomes a white Bear with base power and toughness 3/5, hexproof, and double strike until end of turn. Whenever it deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Hursar probably have something in here little man can use. Here! Child's training sledge!”
cards.name: Hursar's Study
cards.text:
Archive 6 (As this enters, shuffle the top six cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
You may play Aura and Equipment cards from the archived library, and play those spells as though they had flash.

cards.name: Hursar the Unflinching
cards.text:
[+1]: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to up to one other target permanent until your next turn.
[-2]: Target creature gets +3/+3 until your next turn.
[-3]: Untap all nonland permanents you control.

cards.name: I, Queen of Eons
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a token that's a copy of another target permanent. Exile that token at the beginning of your next upkeep.
[-3]: If it's not an extra turn, you take an extra turn after this one, then skip your next turn that's not an extra turn.
[-6]: Until end of turn, planeswalkers become copies of I, Queen of Eons, except they aren't legendary. Destroy all nonland, non-I permanents.

cards.name: I's Observatory
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{U}: Until end of turn, I's Observatory becomes a 1/4 creature. It's still a land. It has menace if {B} was spent to activate this ability, has first strike if {R} was spent, and assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power if {G} was spent.

cards.flavor: “I have one rule: never be boring.”
cards.name: I's Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, you may cast a card from the archived library with a lesser mana value without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: Removing the pilots from the robots allowed increasingly dangerous upgrades within their chassis.
cards.name: Ignition Sequence
cards.text: You get a fuse counter, then Ignition Sequence deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of fuse counters you have.

cards.name: Ilieth, Flynn's Soul
cards.text:
Flying, hexproof, haste
Blue permanents you control have hexproof.
Whenever you activate an ability of a red permanent, you may copy that ability. If you do, choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: “A small price to pay for the prosperity the Empire provides you.”
cards.name: Imperial Tribute
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or finishes drawing cards during your turn, you gain 1 life and create a Treasure token.
Sacrifice two Treasures: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Now will you tell me where it is, or do you need another talk with my friend here?”
cards.name: Inquisitor's Blade
cards.text: {3}{B}, {T}: Choose a card name. Target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a card with the chosen name. If they do, put the revealed cards into their graveyard. Otherwise, they shuffle their library.

cards.flavor:
“You'll open up... one way or another.”
—Inquisitor Visilaca
cards.name: Inquisitor's Chamber
cards.text:
Inquisitor's Chamber enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another permanent: Draw a card.

cards.name: Inquisitor Visilaca
cards.text:
[+1]: Each opponent puts a -1/-1 counter on a creature they control.
[-1]: Exile target card in a graveyard. You gain life equal to its mana value.
[-6]: Choose a number. You draw that many cards and you lose that much life.

cards.name: Jozel, Mistress of Trickery
cards.text:
[+2]: Exile another target permanent, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
[-2]: Gain control of target creature unless its controller pays its mana cost.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “If a nonland permanent would enter and it wasn't cast, it you control enters instead.”

cards.name: Jozel's Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, you exile up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Kovach, the Architect
cards.text:
[+2]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card with mana value less than the number of lands you control, you may put it onto the battlefield.
[-1]: Sacrifice a land. If you do, draw three cards.
[-7]: Destroy up to X target permanents, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Kovach's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Sacrifice a land: Put a card from the archived library into your hand.

cards.flavor: “So you're about to die. Lucky you.”
cards.name: Last Request
cards.text: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Choose up to one card of each card type and put those cards into your hand.

cards.flavor:
“The wanderers have built and broken Novea countless times before. This time, we're fixing it for good.”
—Yuno Moonchaser
cards.name: Lightbearer
cards.text: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of a planeswalker, you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Llereaux, the Splicer
cards.text:
[+2]: Up to one target creature gets +3/+1 until your next turn. Up to one target creature gets -3/-1 until your next turn.
[-2]: Up to two other target permanents you control become a copy of another target permanent until your next turn.
[-8]: Exchange your library and hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
“Immortality has its perks.”
—Llereaux Chiaro
cards.name: Llereaux's Lair
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{W}: Until end of turn, Llereaux's Lair becomes a 1/2 creature. It's still a land. It can't be blocked this turn if {U} was spent to activate this ability, has indestructible if {B} was spent, and gets +2/+1 if {R} was spent.

cards.name: Llereaux's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
If you would draw a card from an archived library, draw a card from each of your archived libraries instead. (Archived libraries are those that still have their Study in play.)

cards.flavor: A lost queen seeks new lands to start her hive.
cards.name: Lonely Trail
cards.text:
Lonely Trail enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
When Lonely Trail enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.name: Mabil, the Wayfarer
cards.text:
[+1]: Return a land you control to its owner's hand. Create a tapped colorless land token named Far-Off Lands with “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
[-1]: Discard a card. Return to your hand a card from your graveyard that shares a color with that card or a color of mana it could produce.
[-3]: For each color pair, you may pay that mana. Create X X/X green and blue Elemental creature tokens, where X is the number of times you do.

cards.flavor: “I don't care about your ‘song of the worlds' nonsense, but keep bringing me new stuff, and I'll keep you funded.”
cards.name: Mabil's Collector
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if it doesn't share a name with a permanent or a card in a graveyard, draw a card.

cards.name: Mabil's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, until end of turn, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells with the same name as that card and spells with that name can't be countered.

cards.flavor:
“No one alive knows who I am. Maybe the dead can be of more assistance.”
—Reyhsia
cards.name: Majestic Tomb
cards.text:
Majestic Tomb enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
When Majestic Tomb enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor: During their short time with the gestalt spark, the aetherborn live with the memories of their many past lives.
cards.name: Memories Past
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards that share a name with a card in their graveyard. If no cards were discarded, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “All the worlds shall reflect the splendor of I.”
cards.name: Merciless Mirror
cards.text:
Whenever one or more creatures deal combat damage to you, exile one of those creatures.
You may cast cards exiled with Merciless Mirror and may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

cards.flavor: The mind is a prison one can never escape.
cards.name: Mind Palace
cards.text:
Mind Palace enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
When Mind Palace enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor: The sun god long gone, the nymphs found comfort in new champions.
cards.name: Moonchaser Meadow
cards.text:
Moonchaser Meadow enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor:
“Daisite's not quite prepared for my children. Guess I'll have to find another solution...”
—Tanya, Leader of the Pack
cards.name: Mooncursed Howler
cards.text: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Mooncursed Howler this turn dies, create a 2/2 red Werewolf creature token with first strike.

cards.flavor:
“Goodnight, moon!”
—Tanya, Leader of the Pack
cards.name: Moonshard Crater
cards.text:
Moonshard Crater enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{2}{R}, {T}: Each player sacrifices a nonbasic land.

cards.flavor: Red flowers are a powerful herb, sure to restore any warrior. Pink flowers are a powerful poison, sure to ruin any warrior.
cards.name: Mother of Herbs
cards.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Natural Beauty
cards.text: Search your library for a permanent card that could produce {G}, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: “You will be given eternal unlife. For this, you must scour the worlds, eradicating unlife in all its other forms. Do you accept?”
cards.name: Necroessence
cards.text: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature an opponent controlled died this turn, return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
“Guess I got a little too excited last night.”
—Tanya, Leader of the Pack
cards.name: Nightly Herald
cards.text: Whenever Nightly Herald attacks, it deals damage to the defending player equal to the number of Wolves and Werewolves you control.

cards.name: Nsimi's Scrambler
cards.text:
Flash
Whenever Nsimi's Scrambler deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

cards.name: Nsimi's Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: “This will hardly be a fair fight. There's only two of you.”
cards.name: Nsimi's Trickery
cards.text: Exile target permanent, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. If that permanent was an attacking creature, you may have it enter tapped and attacking.

cards.name: Nsimi Skydart
cards.text:
[+1]: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
[-2]: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Untap all permanents you control during each other players untap step” and “Draw a card during each other player's draw step.”

cards.flavor:
“Nothing planeswalks, in or out!”
—Pidge
cards.name: Nullifier of Planar Energy
cards.text:
Activated abilities of other permanents cost an additional “Sacrifice a permanent” to activate unless they're mana abilities.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Nullifier of Planar Energy: Remove all counters from target nonland permanent.

cards.flavor: Every hive starts somewhere.
cards.name: Nvali Drone
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a creature spell for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

cards.name: Object of Awe
cards.text:
{T}: Put a luster counter on Object of Awe.
{1}{R}, {T}: Discard up to X cards, then draw a card for each card discarded this way. X is the number of luster counters on Object of Awe.
{3}{R}: Until end of turn, Object of Awe becomes an X/X red Phoenix creature with flying, where X is the number of luster counters on Object of Awe.

cards.name: Okus, the Fabulous Hat
cards.text:
When Okus, the Fabulous Hat enters, gain control of target creature or planeswalker for as long as you control Okus.
[+1]: You may create a blue Aura enchantment token named Fancy Hat with enchant creature and “Enchanted creature gets -2/-0.”
[-2]: Target player loses life equal to the number of enchantments you control and you gain that much life.

cards.flavor: “Won't you help little old me?”
cards.name: Okus's Hold
cards.text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker
You control enchanted permanent.
Permanents you control but don't own have hexproof.

cards.name: Okus's Study
cards.text:
Archive 4 (As this enters, shuffle the top four cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, gain control of target nonland permanent with a lesser mana value than that card until you draw a card from the archived library.

cards.flavor: As their death draws near, the holder of the gestalt spark chooses the next to carry on their shared life.
cards.name: Onya's Chosen
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever a planeswalker dies, Onya's Chosen deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Onya's Study
cards.text:
Archive 6 (As this enters, shuffle the top six cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control dies, you may play a card from the archived library. (You still pay its costs.)

cards.name: Onya the Gilded
cards.text:
When Onya the Gilded dies, search your library for a planeswalker card with a different name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[-1]: Draw up to two cards. For each of those cards, pay 1 life or discard a card.
[-2]: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until your next turn.
[-3]: Onya the Gilded deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: The insect queen had run out of patience. She would stake her claim here, no matter what the current inhabitants had to say about it.
cards.name: Open the Hive
cards.text: For each nonland token you control, create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.name: Overdrive
cards.text:
Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power X/Y, where X is the greatest base power among creatures you control and Y is the greatest base toughness among creatures you control.
If you control a creature with flying, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. The same is true for first strike, haste, lifelink, menace, prowess, trample, and vigilance.

cards.name: Painful History
cards.text:
Choose target player, then choose two —
• That player loses 2 life.
• That player draws two cards.
• Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature that player controls.

cards.flavor: “By unknown? Unknown? I did this! Hey! This is mine! What are you doing? Get away from me! Get your hands off me!”
cards.name: Palace of Tomorrows
cards.text:
Palace of Tomorrows enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player mills three cards.

cards.name: Pidge's Study
cards.text:
Archive 2 (As this enters, shuffle the top two cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
{R}{W}: Put a nontoken artifact or creature you own on the bottom of the archived library. Create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.name: Pidge and Brownie
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Cat creature token with lifelink.
[-1]: When you next activate a nonmana ability of target permanent this turn, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
[-7]: Exile up to seven target permanents. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: She may have been stuck, but the unusual robot gave her views she'd never even dreamed of.
cards.name: Planar Uplink

cards.flavor: “No matter what I do, no one remembers. I've lost everything I've ever accomplished. Why do you deserve better? Why shouldn't you be forgotten as well?”
cards.name: Price of Memories
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in their graveyard.

cards.flavor: With his power and youth being ripped away by the day, Undue sought help in the last place he would have ever expected.
cards.name: Pristine Chapel
cards.text:
As Pristine Chapel enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.

cards.name: Qaraz, the Dying Wish
cards.text:
[+1]: Exile the top card of your library. When a source you control deals damage to an opponent this turn, put the exiled card into your hand.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller reveals the top card of their library, then puts it onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card.
[-6]: Exile your library. You may play cards exiled this way for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Qaraz's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, exile the top card of the archived library and your main library. You may cast those cards this turn and may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

cards.flavor:
“Of course I was a brat. We all were, then. All that power, all that lack of consequence...”
—Llereaux Chiaro
cards.name: Rambunctious Upstart
cards.text: Whenever Rambunctious Upstart attacks, up to one target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn and up to one target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The jungle has one law: be stronger than everything else.
cards.name: Raw Muscle
cards.text: Once each turn, when a creature you control enters, you may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power.

cards.flavor:
“My time is over. May you carry it well.”
—Onya, passing their spark
cards.name: Reborn Altar
cards.text:
As Reborn Altar enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

cards.flavor:
“Give the old world a bit a patience and you'll be surprised how it can roar back to life.”
—Yuno Moonchaser
cards.name: Recommissioned Ride
cards.text:
Menace
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Reyhsia, the Honorless
cards.text:
[+1]: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Then if that card wasn't legendary, discard a card.
[-X]: Return target non-Reyhsia legendary permanent card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[-6]: Reyhsia, the Honorless deals 4 damage to each nonlegendary creature.

cards.flavor: “My family is out there, somewhere. One of these stories will point the way, I just know it.”
cards.name: Reyhsia's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
You may play legendary cards from the top of the archived library.

cards.flavor:
“My sacrifices can never measure up to the sacrifices of those we protect.”
—Nayo Nsimi
cards.name: Rice Fields
cards.text:
Rice Fields enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
When Rice Fields enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.name: Ring of Remembrance
cards.text:
{T}: Exile target creature you control.
{2}, {T}: Target creature you control becomes a copy of a card exiled with Ring of Remembrance until end of turn.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Ring of Remembrance: Each creature becomes a copy of a card exiled with Ring of Remembrance until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Wheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!”
—Flynn
cards.name: Rushing Waters
cards.text:
Rushing Waters enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
When Rushing Waters enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor: “Welcome to the party, newblood. Stay awhile, have a drink, and listen to the Song.”
cards.name: Satyr Celebrant
cards.text:
Other creatures you control that entered this turn have haste and lifelink.
{T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Find a nice hat, try it on, the next thing you know it's six months later and everyone hates you.
cards.name: Scarred Victim
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life for each permanent they own that you control.

cards.name: Shambling Hive
cards.text:
Shambling Hive power and toughness are each equal to the number of Insects you control.
Shambling Hive has vigilance as long as you control four or more Insects, and has trample as long as you control eight or more Insects.

cards.name: Shianne, the Song of Creation
cards.text:
[+1]: Create two 1/1 red Satyr creature tokens.
[-1]: Until your next turn, target creature has base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of permanents you control.
[-8]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield, then repeat this process.

cards.flavor: “It is a sad fact that we must occasionally destroy to protect creation.”
cards.name: Shianne's Guardian
cards.text: Whenever Shianne's Guardian or another creature you control enters, you may pay {1}{R}{G}. When you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.

cards.name: Shianne's Study
cards.text:
Archive 7 (As this enters, shuffle the top seven cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
As long as you control five or more creatures, you may play permanent cards from the archived library.

cards.name: Shoulders of Giants
cards.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a permanent card revealed this way with mana value less than the greatest mana value among permanents you control onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor:
“I convinced the villagers not to slaughter one that got past their defenses this time, but I've got better things to spend immortality on than this.”
—Tanya, Leader of the Pack
cards.name: Shredder of Barricades
cards.text:
Haste
Each creature with toughness greater than its power can't block.

cards.name: Sir Éloi
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying and haste.
[-1]: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
[-6]: Search your library for any number of creatures with flying and put them onto the battlefield. Shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
“You were given a choice. Now you shall reap the rewards of it.”
—Emperor Tzhai
cards.name: Smite the Unruly
cards.text: Exile target permanent. Smite the Unruly deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to its controller and you gain that much life.

cards.flavor: Giants live alone more out of necessity than desire.
cards.name: Sociable Giant
cards.text:
If you control seven or more creatures, you may cast Sociable Giant without paying its mana cost.
Trample

cards.name: Soul's Guidestone
cards.text:
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, you may put a soul counter on Soul's Guidestone.
As long as there are five or more soul counters on Soul's Guidestone, it's a 6/6 Golem artifact creature with menace and vigilance.

changes: 2023-07-01 — Has been reworked from "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a planeswalker spell. That planeswalker enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on it."
cards.flavor: “Spark extraction successful. Well, twenty percent successful. We'll need four more.”
cards.name: Spark Laboratory
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among planeswalkers you control.
{1}, {T}: Put a loyalty counter on target planeswalker that activated a loyalty ability this turn.

cards.flavor: Winona found that being cast out only emboldened her fellow elves.
cards.name: Spellslinger Elf
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Spellslinger Elf deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then you may cast a card from your hand with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: “Good, warm house get little man through winter. Hursar sleep outside like real man!”
cards.name: Sturdy Outpost
cards.text:
As Sturdy Outpost enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

cards.flavor: Dark and hopeless times is when light shines the brightest.
cards.name: Sunflower Fields
cards.text:
As Sunflower Fields enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

cards.name: Sword of Rags and Riches

cards.flavor: Four families become one.
cards.name: Take the City
cards.text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Exile target tapped nonland permanent.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.
• Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
• Exile Take the City, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

cards.id: Tanya, Leader of the Pack//Tanya, the Mooncursed_SPK
cards.name: Tanya, Leader of the Pack
cards.text:
[+2]: Create a 2/2 red Werewolf creature token with first strike and haste.
[-3]: Tanya deals 3 damage to each creature that's not a Wolf or a Werewolf.
[-8]: For each permanent your opponents control, that player sacrifices it unless they have Tanya deal 2 damage to them.

cards.id: Tanya, Leader of the Pack//Tanya, the Mooncursed_SPK
cards.name: Tanya, the Mooncursed
cards.text:
[+1]: Tanya, the Mooncursed becomes a legendary 3/1 red Werewolf creature with first strike until end of turn.
[-2]: Tanya, the Mooncursed deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
[-4]: Destroy target nonbasic colorless permanent.

cards.flavor: “It's simple, really. We just blow up the moon!”
cards.name: Tanya's Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to a player, draw a card from the archived library.

cards.flavor:
“Time travel is a tricky business. When you get back, no one remembers they hired you in the first place. And that is why you are paying me everything up front.”
—Xirix
cards.name: Temporal Waypoint
cards.text: Players skip their untap steps during extra turns.

cards.flavor:
“No one wants the job. But it needs doing and I'm the only one out of all of us with the stomach for it.”
—Inquisitor Visilaca
cards.name: Thankless Work
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card except for the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.name: The Flock
cards.text:
[+1]: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. That player loses 2 life.
[0]: Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying for each loyalty counter on The Flock.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “If a permanent you don't control would leave the battlefield, you may instead exile it, then return that card to the battlefield under your control. It's a 1/1 blue Bird creature with flying.”

cards.flavor: No one knows where they came from, nor what they want—only that wherever they go, destruction follows.
cards.name: The Flock Arrives
cards.text: Destroy all nonland permanents. Draw a card for each card type among cards in graveyards.

cards.name: The Forgotten
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 0/1 blue Illusion creature token.
[-2]: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills six cards.”

cards.flavor: The rumbling carriage ensures each lost soul returns to its proper place.
cards.name: The Resting Place
cards.text:
Whenever The Resting Place deals combat damage to a player, you may return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Crew 2

cards.flavor:
“No one will mourn your death. In fact, I hear they're planning a party.”
—Xirix
cards.name: Timely Death
cards.text: Destroy target non-Xirix permanent. If that permanent had mana value 6 or greater, take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Tireless Endeavor
cards.text:
Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X, where X is 1 plus the greatest mana value among artifacts you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
You may cast Tireless Endeavor from your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact in addition to paying its other costs.

cards.flavor: “Normally sledge given to bear cub, but Hursar think you are about right size.”
cards.name: Training Sledge
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has hexproof and vigilance.
Equip {2}

cards.flavor:
“Traveling time takes its toll on the mind and body. That is why it costs extra.”
—Xirix
cards.name: Tree of Timelines
cards.text:
As Tree of Timelines enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.

cards.name: Tzhai's Study
cards.text:
Archive 4 (As this enters, shuffle the top four cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, destroy all nonland permanents you don't control with the same mana value as the drawn card.

cards.flavor: Where some rule by fear or might, Emperor Tzhai rules by abundance and awe.
cards.name: Tzhai's Throne
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}{B}: Until end of turn, Tzhai's Throne becomes a 2/2 creature. It's still a land. It gets +2/+2 if {R} was spent to activate this ability, gets +2/+2 if {G} was spent, and gets +2/+2 if {W} was spent.

cards.name: Tzhai and Azamir
cards.text:
You may play cards exiled with Azamir planeswalkers.
[+1]: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent unless its controller exiles two other permanents they control.
[-7]: Target opponent may have you take two extra turns after this one. If they don't, you control them during their next turn.

cards.name: Undue, the Pale Lich
cards.text:
[+2]: Exile up to three target cards from graveyards.
[+1]: Create a 2/1 black Horse Zombie creature token with lifelink.
[0]: If Undue has six or more loyalty counters on him, each opponent returns a creature card of their choice from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: The lich finds little interest in anything that hasn't died at least once.
cards.name: Undue's Study
cards.text:
Archive 0 (As this enters, shuffle the top zero cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
As Undue's Study enters, shuffle your graveyard into the archived library.

cards.flavor:
“They say age before beauty. I prefer both.”
— I, Queen of Eons
cards.name: Unmatched Vanity
cards.text: Gain control of target nonland permanent if you control a permanent with a greater mana value. Otherwise, destroy that permanent.

cards.name: Unsuspecting
cards.text:
Choose one, then choose another for each card named Unsuspecting in your graveyard.
• You may return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
• You may put an artifact, creature, or land card with mana value 2 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.
• Untap up to three target permanents.
• You gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: Unknown lands are dangerous lands, and left alone by the primal humans.
cards.name: Untrekked Territory
cards.text:
Untrekked Territory enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
When Untrekked Territory enters, you may put a loyalty counter on a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor: “All things begin and end in blood.”
cards.name: Ve'aja, the First Bloodline
cards.text:
Ve'aja, the First Bloodline's power is equal to the number of Clerics you control.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you lose X life and create X 1/1 black Cleric creature tokens, where X is that creature's power.

cards.name: Visilaca's Study
cards.text:
Archive 13 (As this enters, shuffle the top thirteen cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose half your life, rounded up, and you draw half of the cards from the archived library, rounded up.

cards.flavor:
“The only just forum is the battlefield.”
—Sir Éloi
cards.name: Warbattered Helm
Winona, the Heretic
cards.text:
[+1]: Add {R} or {G}. You can't spend this mana to cast an Elf spell.
[-2]: Winona, the Heretic deals 4 damage to any target. If that target is an Elf, Winona deals 4 damage to that Elf's controller.
[-6]: Until end of turn, any time you could cast an instant, you may pay {R}. When you do, Winona deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.name: Winona's Study
cards.text:
Archive 3 (As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
You may cast the top card of the archived library. Whenever you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: “Promising! But allow me to show you how a proper revolution is done.”
cards.name: Xenocrata's Arming
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Copy target instant, sorcery, or Equipment spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Create a token that's a copy of target Equipment you control.

cards.name: Xirix, the Usurper
cards.text:
You may activate loyalty abilities of Xirix, the Usurper during extra turns any time you could cast an instant.
[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[-2]: Destroy each nonland, non-Xirix permanent with the greatest mana value among non-Xirix permanents on the battlefield.
[-6]: Put target permanent card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

changes: 2024-03-01 — No longer gains recursive copies of its own ability.
cards.flavor: “This one seems familiar, let me check something for just a moment...”
cards.name: Xirix's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Recursive — Xirix's Study has all nonrecursive abilities of all Study cards in graveyards except for their archive abilities.

cards.flavor:
“Someone. Anyone. Please. We don't care who you are. We don't care what you've done. Only that you're willing to help.”
—Yuno Moonchaser
cards.name: Yuno's Beacon
cards.text: Double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.

cards.flavor: “There's an art to dying, but most don't get many chances to improve their technique.”
cards.name: Yuno's Study
cards.text:
Archive 2 (As this enters, shuffle the top two cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, target creature you control gains vigilance and indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Yuno Moonchaser
cards.text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until your next turn.
[+1]: Choose a player or planeswalker other than Yuno Moonchaser. Creatures can't attack that player or planeswalker until your next turn.
[0]: Move any number of loyalty counters from Yuno onto target planeswalker.

cards.name: Zero's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Once each turn, you may cast the top card of the archived library without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: “A world without war is perfection. A world without warriors is a disgrace.”
cards.name: Éloi's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
Once during each combat phase, you may cast the top card of the archived library as though it had flash.
